amendment.description: Amendment strikes a provision relating to the Freedom of Information Act, and clarifies that the membership of the Drug Enforcement Administration in the intelligence community is limited to the Office of National Security Intelligence.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-438 to strike a provision relating to the Freedom of Information Act in Section 421 of the Committee Amendment, relating to protection of intelligence sources and methods. Clarify that the membership of the Drug Enforcement Administration on the intelligence community is limited to the Office of National Security Intelligence of the Drug Enforcement Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
